Name: Navigate to Product Category and Add iPhone to Cart
Description: Start at the home page, navigate to the iPhone category, select storage options, and add the iPhone 15 Plus to the cart.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link Apple -> Navigate to page 'category page#category/*'
Step 3: Click on label storageColorOption (512GB)
Step 4: Click on button Increased
Step 5: Click on button Close
Step 6: Click on link iPhone15Plus -> Navigate to page 'product#product/*'
Step 7: Click on label Variant512GB
Step 8: Click on button Decreased
Step 9: Click on link ProductPhone -> Navigate to page 'phone category#*/*'
Step 10: Click on button AddToCart
Step 11: Click on label 512GB
Step 12: Click on button Close -> Navigate to page ''
Step 13: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Test Adding and Removing Items from Shopping Cart
Description: Navigate to the home page, select items with various storage options, add them to the cart, and then remove an item. Verify the home page after removal.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Hover over item object
Step 3: Click on link Apple -> Navigate to page 'category page#category/*'
Step 4: Click on label storageColorOptions (StorageOption1TB)
Step 5: Click on label storageColorOptions (Color)
Step 6: Click on button Buy
Step 7: Click on button addToCart (AddToCart)
Step 8: Click on label storageColorOptions (Storage256GB)
Step 9: Click on label storageColorOptions (Green)
Step 10: Click on button Buy
Step 11: Click on button ProductAdded
Step 12: Click on link sortOptions (ByPrice)
Step 13: Click on button addToCart (AddToCart2)
Step 14: Click on label storageColorOptions (Storage512GB)
Step 15: Click on label storageColorOptions (ColorBlueTitanium)
Step 16: Click on button Buy
Step 17: Hover over link CartCount3
Step 18: Click on link cartCount (CartCount3Dynamic) -> Navigate to page 'cart page#cart'
Step 19: Click on button RemoveItem -> Navigate to page ''
Step 20: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Complete Checkout Process for Multiple Products
Description: Navigate to category, add products to cart, proceed to checkout, fill in shipping information, and complete the order.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to category/*
Step 2: Click on button addToCart (AddToCart)
Step 3: Click on button Close
Step 4: Click on button addToCart (AddToCart2)
Step 5: Click on label storageColorOption (512GB)
Step 6: Click on label storageColorOption (Green)
Step 7: Click on button Buy
Step 8: Click on link sortOptions (SortByTitle)
Step 9: Click on link cartCount (CartCount1) -> Navigate to page 'cart page#cart'
Step 10: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout info#checkout/info'
Step 11: Hover over div object
Step 12: Click on input Email
Step 13: Enter input value in input Email2
Step 14: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/shipping-address'
Step 15: Hover over div object
Step 16: Click on input FirstName
Step 17: Hover over div object2
Step 18: Enter input value in input FirstName2
Step 19: Click on input LastName
Step 20: Hover over div object3
Step 21: Enter input value in input LastName2
Step 22: Click on input Address
Step 23: Hover over div object4
Step 24: Enter input value in input Address2
Step 25: Click on input ZipCode
Step 26: Enter input value in input ZipCode2
Step 27: Click on div Phone
Step 28: Hover over div object5
Step 29: Click on input City
Step 30: Hover over div object6
Step 31: Enter input value in input City2
Step 32: Click on input ShippingState
Step 33: Hover over div object7
Step 34: Enter input value in input State
Step 35: Click on input Phone
Step 36: Enter input value in input Phone2
Step 37: Click on button ContinueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/payment'
Step 38: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank you#thank-you/*'
Step 39: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
